LanguageData.PoluxTreeSpawn.label: polux tree
LanguageData.PoluxTreeSpawn.letterText: A polux tree has sprouted nearby!\n\nPolux trees slowly absorb pollution from the terrain around them. Unlike most methods of clearing polluted terrain, polux trees do not generate toxic wastepacks.
LanguageData.RefugeePodCrash_Baby.label: transport pod crash
